Html:
I am trying to use the datepicker in the datagrid and need to display my dates in uk format dd/mm/yyyy. 

By default the datepicker is showing in en-us format mm/dd/yyyy. Based on a suggestion to use xml:lang setting, I have tried that but it is not showing any difference.

 

 <my:DatePicker xml:lang="en-GB" SelectedDate="{Binding Path=date}" SelectedDateFormat="Short" />

Is there some other way the locale has to be set for the datepicker to properly format based on it?
